description:
Hi guys. My name is Ernani and I'm a Brazilian. My course is about the dangers of my country and how you can avoid them.Brazil is a great place to visit, but is not Disneyland. My goal is to teach everything I know about the dark side of Brazil. Tourists are rapped, robbed and killed all the time over here and I can give you some useful knowledge so that wont happen to you or you family.

This course wont be long, but if you guys have further questions in any subject I will record more classes. If you have any questions I will be glad to answer them.

You can get the course right here on this page. Just look for the big green button on the top right that says "Take This Course."

Click the green button, make your payment, and I'll see you in class!
title: Survive in Brazil during the World Cup
